entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
